UNSPEAKABLE: Sorry, I cannot pronounce this response.
INVALID_FORMAT: Sorry, the question and answer based dialog is not supported in command mode. Please ask module developer.
INVALID_COMMAND: Sorry, I cannot understand your command. Try again.
CMD_HELP_DESCRIPTION: This command could tell you the description of that command.
CMD_HELP_COMMAND_EXAMPLE: Say command name after 'help' like this. 'help all modules'.
CMD_LIST_COMMANDS_DESCRIPTION: This command could tell the name of all commands available.
CMD_LIST_MODULES_DESCRIPTION: This command tell you the name of all available modules.
CMD_HIDE_ALL_MODULES_DESCRIPTION: This command will hide all your available modules.
CMD_HIDE_ALL_MODULES_EXCEPT_DESCRIPTION: This command will hide all modules except the selected module(s)
CMD_HIDE_ALL_MODULES_EXCEPT_RESULT: All modules will be hidden except the selected ones
CMD_HIDE_MODULE_DESCRIPTION: This command will hide the specified module.
CMD_SHOW_ALL_MODULES_DESCRIPTION: This command will show all your available modules
CMD_SHOW_MODULE_DESCRIPTION: This command will show the specified module
CMD_SAY_DESCRIPTION: This command will say anything you want.
CMD_REBOOT_DESCRIPTION: This command will reboot the magic mirror instantly.
CMD_SHUTDOWN_DESCRIPTION: This command will shutdown the magic mirror instantly.
CMD_STAY_AWAKE_DESCRIPTION: Do not turn the screen off
